description: This file defines a `MappingService` class that provides methods for interacting with a backend API related to mappings, including CRUD operations, testing, validation, and import/export functionalities. It acts as a client-side API wrapper for mapping-related endpoints.

classes.name: MappingService
classes.description: A class encapsulating methods for managing mappings via API calls, including CRUD, validation, testing, and import/export.

methods.name: getMappings
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of mappings with optional search parameters.

methods.name: getMapping
methods.description: Retrieves a specific mapping by ID.

methods.name: createMapping
methods.description: Creates a new mapping with provided data.

methods.name: updateMapping
methods.description: Updates an existing mapping identified by ID.

methods.name: testMapping
methods.description: Tests a mapping with sample data.

methods.name: generateMapping
methods.description: Auto-generates a mapping between source and target schemas.

methods.name: getMappingRules
methods.description: Retrieves rules for a specific mapping.

methods.name: addMappingRule
methods.description: Adds a new rule to a mapping.

methods.name: updateMappingRule
methods.description: Updates a specific rule within a mapping.

methods.name: deleteMappingRule
methods.description: Deletes a rule from a mapping.

methods.name: getTransformations
methods.description: Fetches transformations associated with a mapping.

methods.name: addTransformation
methods.description: Adds a new transformation to a mapping.

methods.name: deleteTransformation
methods.description: Removes a transformation from a mapping.

methods.name: exportMapping
methods.description: Exports a mapping in specified format (json or yaml).

methods.name: importMapping
methods.description: Imports a mapping configuration from a file.
